borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: The proposed ground floor extension would create long rooms and the applicant has failed to demonstrate that all the rooms would achieve suitable levels of internal daylight and sunlight. As such the proposed development would fail to comply with:- Paragraphs of the National Planning Policy Framework (July 2021); and- Policy D6 of the London Plan (March 2021).

The proposed development by reason of its fenestration design and proportions of doors and windows would not positively respond to the original architecture of the host dwelling and the wider area. As such the proposed development would fail to comply with:- Paragraphs 126, 130 and 134 of the National Planning Policy Framework (July 2021); - Policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (March 2021); - Policy CP3 of the Core Strategy DPD (July 2010);- Policy BP11 of the Local Development Framework Borough Wide Development Plan;- Policies SP 2, DMD 1 and DMD 6 of the draft LBBD Local Plan 2037 Regulation 19 (December 2021); - Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).

. The proposed part single/part two storey rear extensions by reason of their bulk, scale, and mass, would constitute a dominant form of development that would overwhelm the host building thereby failing to achieve subordination. It is also considered that the proposal would also fail to positively respond to the original architecture and locally distinct forms of the group of the buildings. As such the proposed development would fail to comply with:- Paragraphs 126, 130 and 134 of the National Planning Policy Framework (July 2021); - Policy D1 and D4 of the London Plan (March 2021); - Policy CP3 of the Core Strategy DPD (July 2010);- Policy BP11 of the Local Development Framework Borough Wide Development Plan;- Policies SP 2, DMD 1 and DMD 6 of the draft LBBD Local Plan 2037 Regulation 19 (December 2021); - Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012).
description: Construction of a part two storey part single storey rear extension
